name: XWUI Date Range Picker Component
description: Date range picker component for selecting a range of dates. Extends XWUIDatePicker functionality for range selection. Supports start and end date selection, custom separators, and date constraints. Uses XWUIInput and XWUICalendar internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

format.description: Date format string for display and input

placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the input field

separator.description: Separator string between start and end dates

showCalendarIcon.description: Whether to show calendar icon in the input

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the date range picker

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

value.description: Selected date range as tuple [startDate, endDate] (Date objects or strings)
